system.description:
Beginning at 7th level, whenever you make an attack using a weapon with the long-range or scoped weapon augment, you ignore the disadvantage normally incurred by firing at a target beyond the weaponâ€™s normal range and you may reroll any @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.vKckTQevhrZgeJJ9]{Favored Ordnance} die results of 1. In addition, you gain an expertise die on Stealth checks, and while you are hidden any checks made to locate you from 30 or more feet away have disadvantage.

At 16th level, whenever you make an attack using a weapon with the long-range or scoped weapon augment, any favored ordnance damage dice you would roll instead deal their maximum result.
